name: MIMICUS
description:
DESCRIPTION:

Game made in basically one day in Unreal Engine 4 for FTGD Jam.

Enemies mimic your actions:

Your enemies will do to you only what you do to them. 

- Kick them, they will kick you. 

- Shoot them, they will shoot you. 

- Or leave them alone, and they will leave you alone as well.

- You can also lure them away by attacking barrels.

Goal:

Traverse the map without being knocked down.

HOW TO PLAY: 

Un-Zip and Run Mimicus.exe to play.

Controls:

W, S, A, D - Movement

RMB - Kick

LMB - Shoot
